name: LivingDependency2
title: livingDependency2
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts that identify specific living conditions (e.g., spouse dependent on patient, walk-up) that are relevant to an evaluation of the patientâ€™s healthcare needs.  This information can be used for discharge planning.  Examples might include Spouse Dependent, Medical Supervision Required, Small Children Dependent.  Used in Version 2.s messaging in the NK1 segment.
